title: History
description:
Onward has been in offshore compliance since 2010 so the progression to Authorized Service Provider for audits is natural one.

Our team has a combined 300+ years of experience in the Oil and Gas Sector.

title: Understand
description: We differ from other audit providers as oil and gas is our specialty. Our team of qualified and competent auditors are oil and gas professionals first. We understand that a management system for an offshore operator is not the same as someone in food processing, or steel manufacturing.

title: Work with you
description: Audits can be viewed as a dreaded undertaking, viewed as costly and cumbersome which is why it's crucial to choose an audit provider that truly understands your business and provides value. We should all be on a journey of continuous improvement, and professional audits identifying root causes can assist greatly with that journey.
